introduction.TEXT:
This is where the business 
happens.

You give me rotations, I give 
you a cool lookin circle
called a sigil.

And then other stuff too 
probably.

But I need those so come to
me every time you have enough
to trade, yes?

kbity.TEXT: You... I can't believe you actually did it.
You've created another kbity cat. How's time supposed to function now?
I mean yeah I was the one who helped you do it but the prices were absurd on purpose.
It's probably fine though. It doesn't have a soul or a part of a soul like you and me.
Maybe you'll get more time every time you get time? Won't that be fun!
And it'll never go away so no need to worry about losing it upon resetting.
